Submodules¶

UUTrack.View.Camera.cameraMain module¶

UUTrack.View.Camera.cameraMainWidget module¶

class UUTrack.View.Camera.cameraMainWidget.cameraMainWidget(maxSize, parent=None)[source]¶

Bases: PyQt4.QtGui.QWidget

Widget for holding the images generated by the camera.

doAutoScale()[source]¶
keyPressEvent(key)[source]¶

Triggered when there is a key press with some modifier. Shift+C: Removes the cross hair from the screen Ctrl+C: Emits a specialTask signal Ctrl+V: Emits a stopSpecialTask signal These last two events have to be handeled in the mainWindow that implemented this widget.

mouseMoved(arg)[source]¶

Updates the position of the cross hair. The mouse has to be moved while pressing down the Ctrl button.

Clears the queue.

Widget for configuring the main parameters of the camera.

Updates the values while being updated

UUTrack.View.Camera.messageWidget module¶

messageWidget created by: AJ Carattino

class UUTrack.View.Camera.messageWidget.messageWidget(parent=None)[source]¶

Bases: PyQt4.QtGui.QWidget

Widget that holds text boxes for displaying information to the user.

logMaxLength = 20¶
logTitle = 'Log'¶
messageTitle = 'Status'¶
setupLog()[source]¶

Startes the log box with a title that will always be displayed on top.

setupMessage()[source]¶

Starts the message box with a title that will always be displayed.

setupStyles()[source]¶

Setups three styles for the bars: Red, Yellow and Default. It is meant to be more graphical to the user regarding the availability of resources.

updateLog(msg)[source]¶

Updates the log displayed to the user by prepending the desired message to the available messages. msg – string or array, in which case every item will be displayed in a new line.

updateMemory(percentage)[source]¶
updateMessage(msg)[source]¶

Updates the message displayed to the user.

Parameters:msg (array or string) – item will be displayed in a new line.
updateProcessor(percentage)[source]¶

UUTrack.View.Camera.specialTaskWorker module¶

class UUTrack.View.Camera.specialTaskWorker.specialTaskWorker(_session, camera, X, Y)[source]¶

Bases: PyQt4.QtCore.QThread

Thread for performing a specific task, for example tracking of a particle in ‘real-time’. It takes as an input the variable _session, and two coordinates X, Y. What the coordinates are, depends on specific applications.

run()[source]¶

Performs a task, for example acquires an image and computes the centroid.

UUTrack.View.Camera.trajectoryWidget module¶

Bases: PyQt4.QtGui.QWidget

Simple plot class for showing the 2D trajectory

Widget for plotting a waterfall plot.

UUTrack.View.Camera.workerThread module¶

class UUTrack.View.Camera.workerThread.workThread(_session, camera)[source]¶

Bases: PyQt4.QtCore.QThread

Thread for acquiring from the camera. If the exposure time is long, this is needed to avoid freezing the GUI.

run()[source]¶

Triggers the Camera to acquire a new Image.
